name: Temple of Causality
description:
Intricate Puzzles:
Each puzzle is a testament to the depth of ancient wisdom and the complexity of causality. Every choice you make reverberates through the temple, shaping the course of your obyssey. Master the unique mechanic: pushing one block triggers an automatic cascase, moving all causally connected blocks.


Immersive Exploration:
Roam through a temple filled with diverse locations, from buddhist statues to Hindu ruins. Unearth long-buried secrets and strands of forgotten history.


A Journey of Transcendence:
Master the concept of causality and travel to the heart of the temple, where the laws of existence are surpassed. Your decisions hold the key to unlocking the secrets of this temple.

Ancient Wisdom:
Journey through a realm steeped in the wisdom of diverse religious philosophies. Each puzzle carries echoes of Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, and more, weaving a tapestry of profound insights.
